ground_truth.thought: 创建一个带有简洁主题的Excel文件并保存它
ground_truth.name: Excel.create_file

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'Excel.add_sheet', 'description': 'Add a new sheet to the Excel file', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sheet_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the new sheet'}, {'name': 'data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the data to be added to the sheet, in JSON format'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'status', 'description': 'the result of the execution'}]}, {'name': 'Excel.save_file', 'description': 'When all steps done, YOU MUST use save_file() to save Excel', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'status', 'description': 'the result of the execution'}]}, {'name': 'FileOperation.read_file', 'description': 'read file from disk', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'file_path', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The path of the file.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'text', 'description': 'the text of the file.'}]}, {'name': 'Excel.create_file', 'description': 'Create an Excel file with specific themes', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'theme', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the theme used'}, {'name': 'abs_location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': "the Excel file's absolute saving location"}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'status', 'description': 'the result of the execution'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。

作为一名财务顾问，我需要为我的客户制定一个债务管理计划。请从文件 'data_v2/financial_data/debt_info.txt' 中读取债务信息，并将其加入到一个新的Excel文件中。Excel文件应使用简洁主题，并保存在 'outputs/debt_management_plan.xlsx'。此外，我希望在Excel文件中添加一个名为 '债务概览' 的工作表，其中包括从文件中提取的前三个关键点。当前这一步的目标是什么?
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'file_path'的值是什么?

{'text': 'The client has a total debt of $50,000.
The debt includes a mortgage of $30,000 and a car loan of $20,000.
The client has a monthly income of $5,000 and monthly expenses of $3,500.
...'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'text': 'The client has a total debt of $50,000.
The debt includes a mortgage of $30,000 and a car loan of $20,000.
The client has a monthly income of $5,000 and monthly expenses of $3,500.
...'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
创建一个带有简洁主题的Excel文件并保存它
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
